    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature conversion chart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperaturumrechnungstabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Table de conversion de la température</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carta de conversão da temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tavola di conversione di temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα μετατροπής θερμοκρασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tabla de conversión de la temperatura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a conversion chart which is used to relate the temperature in Celsius scale with the temperature in the thermodynamic scale.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Celsius scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conversion charts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Kelvin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermodynamic scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einer Umrechnungstabelle, 
welches verwendet wird, um die Temperatur in der Celsiusskala mit der 
Temperatur in der thermodynamischen Skala in Verbindung zu stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à une table de 
conversion ce qui est employée pour associer la température dans 
l'échelle Celsius avec la température dans l'échelle 
thermo-dynamique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a uma carta de 
conversão qual é usada relacionar a temperatura na escala Célsio 
com a temperatura na escala thermodynamic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad una tavola di 
conversione quale è usata per collegare la temperatura in scala 
centigrado con la temperatura nella scala termodinamica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διάγραμμα μετατροπής που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να αφορά τη θερμοκρασία στην κλίμακα Κελσίου 
με τη θερμοκρασία στη θερμοδυναμική κλίμακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a tabla de conversión 
cuál se utiliza para relacionar la temperatura en escala centígrada 
con la temperatura en la escala termodinámica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Celsiusskala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umrechnungstabellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kelvin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tables de conversion</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
